File /std/room/inherit/terrain_map/factory_base.c

This is specifically for creating rooms in the world map system, where it just makes and passes out the room details. So it does not need to include all the room crap.

Written by Pinkfish

Started Fri Jun 28 16:14:19 PDT 2002
